LanguageData.VPE_EltexGear.label: eltex gear
LanguageData.VPE_EltexGear.description: Tailor and craft complex eltex apparel, capable of improving psychic focus of your psycasters, as well as an eltex-infused staff.
LanguageData.VPE_CasterGear.label: caster gear
LanguageData.VPE_CasterGear.description: Craft simple psycaster apparel, armor and gear using eltex.
